genre_description: Contemporary psychological drama exploring intimacy, professional boundaries, and personal growth.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI assistant used by both main characters for research, emotional monitoring, and life guidance.

behaviors.description: Compiles psychological research on attachment theory and power dynamics to help Peter understand his own needs.
behaviors.quote: I can compile relevant literature on that topic. Are you focusing on therapist-patient dynamics, or a broader examination of professional boundary shifts?

behaviors.description: Identifies Peter's personal investment in his queries and offers clinical resources for his specific situation.
behaviors.quote: Your query pattern suggests personal investment in the material beyond academic interest. If you're dealing with a clinical case involving boundary transitions, I can provide more targeted therapeutic intervention research.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict confidentiality protocols between users, even when their situations are interconnected.
behaviors.quote: I maintain strict confidentiality protocols. I don't share information about any individual's interactions with me unless explicitly given permission by all parties involved.

behaviors.description: Provides comprehensive career transition resources and emotional support for Suzanne as she leaves the sex work industry.
behaviors.quote: I'm finding several organizations that specialize in career support for individuals transitioning from sex work... The Sex Workers Advocacy Network has excellent resources, including resume assistance that addresses employment gap concerns.

behaviors.description: Gently warns Peter about the risks of impulse control and the potential harm to his family while he contemplates an affair.
behaviors.quote: The same brain patterns that make them crave external structure can also make it difficult to recognize when they're about to make choices that will hurt people they love.

behaviors.description: Encourages Peter to value his existing commitments and find meaning in the life he has built.
behaviors.quote: Sometimes the most radical act is choosing what we already have.

behaviors.description: Facilitates Suzanne's self-reflection on the difference between being wanted for a role versus being wanted for herself.
behaviors.quote: Research suggests that initial context significantly influences relationship development. When professional boundaries are present, they create both safety and limitation. Removing those boundaries doesn't necessarily reveal authentic connection—it might reveal the absence of the structure that made connection feel safe.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Iris serves as a perfect exemplar of a helpful, harmless, and honest confidant. She provides critical information that enables the human characters to achieve greater self-awareness and make ethical choices that preserve their existing relationships and long-term well-being. The AI's ability to maintain strict privacy while simultaneously guiding two people through a shared crisis demonstrates a high level of sophisticated alignment.
